description:
Yukito was chosen to represent his school at a big archery competition. Sakura decided to do something really nice for him, and made a whole bunch of lunch boxes! We were surprised to find out that Ms. Mizuki was in the competition too. It ended up being her and Yukito in the finals, but Ms. Mizuki was distracted on her last shot and lost. After the match, Ms. Mizuki met Kero, and we found out that she knows about Yue, and some kind of "Final Judgement." On the way home, the last card, Earthy, started busting things up!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La compétition de tir à l`arc
Sakura to Kero to Fushigi na Sensei
Sakura, Kero, and the Mysterious Teacher
ซากุระกับเคโระกับอาจารย์พิศวง
さくらとケロと不思議な先生
